issue.subject: Improve stereotype file
issue.description:
In order to simplify the association of a file to a resource, we would like to propose the upload of OnlineResource directly in the metadata form instead of managing it diffusion.

For now th stereotype "file" include a gco:CharacterString element. To be compliant with ISO 19115, we have to include a gmd:url element in gmd:linkage.

I would like to add an option in the stereotype "file" to choose the element to include in the xml. If nothing is stored, the gco:CharacterString should be used.

Do you think it's the right way to do this.

journals.notes: After a discussion with Yves, I will manage it by using an XSLT applied to a virtual service.
